    WING NUS Information Retrieval (IR) and Knowledge Organisation (KO) Seminar

    In light of the success of the former NLP seminar held by our group, we will be running our another IR seminar in 2021 autumn semester, tentatively from 8th Oct to 17th Dec (6 weeks). Invited speakers will talk about the latest breakthrough in their research. We will have six invited speakers, alternately introduce their research of recommender system and scientific document processing for each two week.

    For interested public participants, please send Min an email at kanmy@comp.nus.edu.sg.

    Schedule

    DateDescription

    10:00 AM Sep 29th SGT


    When is SGT?

    Hongwei Wang - Graph Representation Learning: From Knowledge Graphs to Recommender Systems

    Hongwei is a Postdoctoral Researcher @University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign

    [ Speaker's Bio & Talk Overview  ]

    16:00 PM Oct 28th SGT


    When is SGT?

    Oana-Maria Camburu: Neural Networks with Natural Language Explanations

    Oana is a Postdoctoral Researcher @ University of Oxford

    [ Speaker's Bio & Talk Overview ]

    10:00 AM Nov 18th SGT


    When is SGT?

    Yanan Zheng: Revisiting Few-Shot learning for Natural Language Understanding

    Yanan is a PostDoc Researcher @ Tsinghua University

    [ Speaker's Bio & Talk Overview ]

    10:00 AM Dec 22nd SGT


    When is SGT?

    Xiangyu Zhao: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Recommender Systems

    Xiangyu Zhao is an Assistant Professor @ City University of Hong Kong (CityU)

    [ Speaker's Bio & Talk Overview ]

    10:00 AM Dec 29th SGT


    When is SGT?

    Arman Cohan: Beyond Sentences and Paragraphs: Towards Document-level and Multi-document Understanding

    Arman Cohan is a research scientist @ Allen Institute for AI (AI2) and an Affiliate Assistant Professor @ University of Washington(UW)

    [ Speaker's Bio & Talk Overview ]
